DinkInstallerView/ExtractDmodMemory: Use temporary memory buffer instead of temporary file (uses a lot of memory)
DinkInstallerView/ExtractDmodMemory_Tool: Temporarily extracts the dmod to memory instead of using a file. This is technically faster but can use hundreds of MB of memory!

DmodBrowser/ErrorDmodAlreadyInSymbolicLi: DMOD is already at symbolic link destination! No need to create it!
DmodBrowser/ErrorSymbolicLinkAlreadyExis: Symbolic link already exists for this DMOD at destination! No need to create it!
DmodBrowser/RefreshTooltip: Refreshes the dmod list and clears the search
AboutWindow/Description: A Launcher / Installer / Manager for various Dink Smallwood source ports and DMODs...
AboutWindow/Package/DinkNetwork/Descript:
git: https://www.dinknetwork.com/


Dink's home for the last couple of decades!
AboutWindow/Package/DinkGraphics/Descrip: The application makes use of Dink Smallwood graphics, acquired from here: https://www.dinknetwork.com/file/dink_smallwood_bmp_graphics/
AboutWindow/Package/AvaloniaUI/Descripti:
Official website: https://avaloniaui.net/
git: https://github.com/AvaloniaUI/Avalonia


The GUI framework powering this application! You should check it out.
AboutWindow/Package/Citrus.Avalonia/Desc:
git: https://github.com/AvaloniaUI/Citrus.Avalonia

A theme style collection for AvaloniaUI. It's neat, I like it!
AboutWindow/Package/SevenZipExtractor/De:
git: https://github.com/adoconnection/SevenZipExtractor

A wrapper for the 7zip library dll. Used in the Windows version of the application for the Dink Installer.
AboutWindow/Package/SharpCompress/Descri:
original git: https://github.com/adamhathcock/sharpcompress
Modification git: https://github.com/drone1400/sharpcompress

A C# implementation of various compression algorithms. The version used here is modified to have faster BZIP2 compression/decompression.
AboutWindow/Package/Bzip2/Description:
original git: https://github.com/jaime-olivares/bzip2
Modification git: https://github.com/drone1400/bzip2

A C# implementation of BZIP2 compression. A modified version of this is used in the modified version of SharpCompress.
AboutWindow/Package/NewtonsoftJson/Descr:
Official website: https://www.newtonsoft.com/json
git: https://github.com/JamesNK/Newtonsoft.Json

JSON Serialization. Used for the configuration files.
AboutWindow/Package/GetText/Description:
git: https://github.com/perpetualKid/GetText.NET

C# implementation of gettext. Used for parsing FreeDink localization files.
AboutWindow/Package/HtmlAgilityPack/Desc:
Official website: https://html-agility-pack.net/
git: https://github.com/zzzprojects/html-agility-pack

HTML parser - used to parse data from The Dink Network in the online DMOD browser
